item.description:
Hi Everyone...

Now that it's Spring and the days will be getting longer... :) Let's meet up for various five mile runs around the city and Cambridge, etc...

I miss my five mile Fridays in Manhattan, where I'd meet up with a few friends after work and run different parts of the city. It was a cool way to see the city. It was also a social run so it was a lot of fun and a good way to get to know other people who enjoy running.

Not to mention, you're getting in a good workout while taking in the city's beautiful urbanscapes. Afterward, we might hit a local or go home and shower and head out again later for dinner or drinks...

I can think of several places that would be great for group/social runs:

-Along the beaches and Castle Island in South Boston.
-Along the Charles (Boston and Cambridge)
-JP Reservoir
-The Arnold Arboretum in JP
-Through the Parks (The Common, Boston Gardens, The Commonwealth Mall and The Fens)
-Minuteman Bike Path

Cheers!
Michael
